input.sentences: students were getting excited for their graduation ceremony .
family and friends were invited to have food beforehand .
the commencement began with an opening speech .
the students continued to listen to all the speeches from the faculty .
the students began to walk across the stage to obtain their diploma .
output.sentences: Mabel, Pamela and Gretchen spoke before the graduation cermony about the graduation prank.
Going over the last part of their plan: Mabel confirmed the table will collapse during reception, causing Velma's pink cake to fall.
Velma, class valedictorian and ceremony speaker, will be standing between Pamela and Gretchen helpless to save her cake.
The women switched out Velma's cake with a maggot filled replica: everyone attending the reception will see it.
Confirming between them that the plan was set, the women amble to the stage as graduates and potential criminals.
